data.title: Usher Raymond III (1955-2008)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Usher Raymond III born 1955 Chattanooga, Hamilton, Tennessee, United States died 2008 Atlanta, DeKalb, Georgia, United States including ancestors + children + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Usher "Urkie" Raymond III

Born 26 Mar 1955 in Chattanooga, Hamilton, Tennessee, United States [uncertain]

Ancestors

Son of Usher Raymond II and [mother unknown]

Brother of Connie Raymond and Linda Gail Raymond

Husband of [private wife (1950s - unknown)]

Husband of [private wife (1940s - unknown)]

Father of Usher Raymond IV

Died 18 Jan 2008 at age 52 in Atlanta, DeKalb, Georgia, United States

Profile last modified 10 May 2024 | Created 3 Sep 2014

This page has been accessed 9,073 times.

Biography

Usher Raymond III is a part of US Black heritage.

Usher Raymond III was born on 26 Mar 1955.[1] He was the son of Usher Raymond II (1932-1987) and Ernestine Carter. He graduated from Howard High School in 1973 and was the captain of the basketball team there. He went to Motlow State Community College. One of his children is singer Usher Raymond IV.[2]

He died in Atlanta, Georgia in 2008.[1][2] He was buried in Highland Memorial Gardens in Chattanooga, Tennessee.[3]

Research Notes

Mother's obituary:

"Obituary for Evangelist Ernestine B. Carter," Taylor Funeral Home, https://www.taylorfh.com/obituaries/Ernestine-Carter/#!/Obituary : accessed 30 Jul 2023.

↑ 2.0 2.1 "Raymond, Usher 'Urkie' III", obituary, The Chattanoogan, 19 Jan 2008, http://www.chattanoogan.com/2008/1/19/120383/Raymond-Usher-Urkie-III.aspx : accessed 30 Jul 2023.

↑ Find a Grave, database and images (https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/56252393/usher-terry-raymond: accessed 30 July 2023), memorial page for Rev Usher Terry “Urkie” Raymond III (26 Mar 1955–18 Jan 2008), Find A Grave: Memorial #56252393, citing Highland Memorial Gardens, Chattanooga, Hamilton County, Tennessee, USA; Maintained by Midgette-Trent (contributor 46829053).
